features: 【Building Blocks for Kids Ages 6-8-12】Let your child's imagination run wild with these 320 colorful building blocks that can be easily combined into any shape. From flowers and animals to castles and robots, your child can create anything they can think of and develop their spatial relationships, 3D spatial imagination, and hand-eye coordination.

【Upgrade Your Building Experience】We've made some improvements to our building blocks to provide a better experience for your child. Our blocks are now larger, smoother, and burr-free, making them safer and more aesthetically pleasing. The upgraded structure ensures that the blocks fit together more securely, allowing your child to create more solid shapes with ease.

【Fun and Educational STEM Toys】Our building sets are not just fun, they're also educational! Sensory educational toys for 6 7 8 9 10 11 12 year old. They offer advanced challenges from 2D to 3D, helping your child better understand colors and shapes while improving their STEM (Science, Technology, Engineering, and Math) skills. Your child will also learn to hone their hands-on skills, develop thinking skills, and increase their patience.

【Enjoy Learning & Educational Toys】Whether used in school classrooms, makerspaces, Montessori, daycares, libraries, or at home, our building sets are great for solo play or cooperative group activities. Your child can connect the blocks without limits, stimulating their creativity and improving their attention and memory. They can also be used for decoration and are both fun and functional.

【Great Gifts for Girls and Boys】Building and imagination never gets old, and our block set is perfect for birthday and Christmas gifts for kids 6 7 8 9 10 11 12 year old. It's a single purchase that will bring years of fun and learning. If you have any questions, please contact us, and we'll provide you with a satisfactory answer within 24 hours.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Building block toys sets can be used for single or multi-person party entertainment, allowing children to play together and share great moments with each other, and is also perfect for hours of parent-child bonding. Easy to build and easy to put away for storage.

Building Toys for Kids Ages 4-8-12 By combining different colored blocks together, children can build simple patterns to complex structures such as castles, houses, trees, rockets, cars, animals, sun, etc. It helps to improve your child's creativity and ability to help develop their brain.

Consisting of a new trendy color palette with 8 different colors of small blocks, the appearance is optimized for a more aesthetically pleasing shape and the structure is upgraded for a more solid puzzle shape. These blocks are non-toxic and safe for kids.

Color Blending Fun Learn more about color and enjoy the magic color blending fun! Bright and Engaging Colors Made a new upgrade, size increased, the appearance of a smoother no burr, will not hurt the hands High Quality Blocks Upgraded blocks are now larger, smoother, burr-free and can be washed at high temperatures, making them safer and more aesthetically pleasing. Safe Material Made of non-toxic high-quality PP plastic. Smooth surface and round edge design won't scratch or hurt little hands.

The shapes of these blocks provide simple and easy connections, which means your child will have hours of frustration-free building and hours of fun! This is the best choice for a birthday Christmas gift for a 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 year old. It will also reduce your child's screen time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars ES MUY EFICAZ
reviews.reviewText: Este juego es muy importante lo pedí para regalar a un niño con problemas d Autismo y sus padres están felices con ese tipo d regalo obsequiado.Gracias por hacer a otros mejor la recreación y aprendizaje d los niños.Bendiciones!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lots of gorgeous colors!
reviews.reviewText: I've been watching my son while he's enthralled with these miniature blocks. I'm always impressed when he discovers a new way to play with them. Most recently, he took an object, a hammer, and built an outline along its perimeter. When he pulled the object away, he had made a hammer out of blocks.My daughter's first instinct was to make jewelry. For a long while, she attempted to make a perfect circle with the colorful pieces. It took many failures before my daughter accepted that it was impossible to not break. She would spend a lengthy amount of time crafting a large necklace, only for it to fragment the millisecond it hit her neck, and then she would go right back at reassembling. She was very motivated. These blocks do that for kids. They are a great toy to have in your arsenal.The pieces allow for movement in whatever work is created. They twist and turn if you've fashioned them to do so. The creative adult could find pleasure from designing with these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Tested it out a little, it’s nice. Worth the money. Rated a 4 due to there being no bad or container to hold all the pieces.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really fun and you get a lot!
reviews.reviewText: My daughter really enjoys these. They're easy to put together and take apart but also stay together well when assembled. My 3 year old can do it easily but it's harder to "see" your creative vision because they're so small, so they're better enjoyed by older kids (my 7 year old loves them).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars An Alternative to Leggos!
reviews.reviewText: I was so pleased to find that the rounded shape of these building blocks actually makes them easier for younger children to assemble. My two young daughters have played with these for hours, which is a great way to get them away from screens. Only regret is that I didn't get a larger pack- ten outta ten- would recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not as picture shows.
reviews.reviewText: I like the way the pieces fit together, however the picture does not equate to what you receive. The small child, with a towering house does not reflect what you get. Also the snap together plastic pieces become loose after just a few snaps.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great indoor fun
reviews.reviewText: This is great indoor fun for when you need something for the kids to do with limited help and supervision. Easy to store away. The quality of the toy is great. The size is perfect not too small but not too large. Bright colors. So many different ways to assemble.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are so fun to build with!
reviews.reviewText: My kids enjoy playing with these and building the different shapes with them. I love that they come with pictures of different things to make because then me and my kids can choose to build based on that or build something from their imagination. Super fun and simple
